name: sbbid
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)), wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

comment: Deduction substituting both sides of a biconditional. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-1993.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-10 and ~ ax-13 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 24-Nov-2022.) Revise ~ df-sb . (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 11-Jul-2023.)
